author: Corinne Abrams
title: Millions’ Worth of Bitcoin Goes Missing at an Indian Exchange. Whodunnit?
text:
Indian cryptocurrency exchange Coinsecure said some $3 million in bitcoin has gone missing from a digital wallet that held its users’ funds, and accused a top company official of involvement in the disappearance.
Coinsecure said its system hadn’t been hacked, but that the losses had occurred as the company was extracting bitcoin to distribute to its customers.
